value.title: Value
value.description: Amount of atto tolar to send.

gas.title: Gas
gas.description: Maximum gas (gas limit) that will be spent to send this transaction.Gas used for transaction sending or computational work in case of smart contracts.

gas_price.title: Gas price
gas_price.description: Amount of gas to pay for each unit of gas. Greater gas price is related to faster time to execute the transaction (transaction fee = gas * gas price).

data.title: Data
data.description: Smart contract bytecode in hex format.

nonce.title: Nonce
nonce.description: Unique transaction index for this sender address (auto-incremented value, each transaction has unique nonce).

SignatureData.title: Signature data
SignatureData.description: Holds information about transaction signer and signature.

SignedTransaction.title: Signed transaction
SignedTransaction.description: Holds transaction object and its signature info.
